content:
a page from Leszek Hondo's 1999 book

Page 28 refers to several people. Among them are:
  • Aleksander Sender Heszel LANDAU (d.1857) may be a son in census family 376
  • Jacob EICHHORN (d.1844#253) was head of census family 181
  • Israel MEISELS (d.1875#321) may have married 1837#51
  • Lazar DAMASZEK (DAMASK) (d.1847#280) was married 10 Mar 1804
  • Jonatan EIBENSCHUTZ (EYBUSCHUTZ) (d.1840#316) was head of census family 313
  • Szimon DANZIG (d.1837#40) was head of census family 536
  • Wolf Ber SCHIF (SZIFF) (d.1842#18) was married to Blumy
Dan Hirschberg
Computer Science
University of California, Irvine, CA 92697-3425
dan at ics.uci.edu
